title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Skills: K-12 AI Education: Practice-Based Simulation Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Computational Thinking and Experience in Analyzing Social Issues
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can implement step-by-step AI model design processes for solving social issues in simulation environments

Learners can write social impact analysis reports of AI systems with over 80% accuracy in formative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
